name: CamIt
short_description: CamIt is a Windows command line tool for continuously capturing a window (or the entire desktop) and saving the video stream as a WMF (Windows Media Format) file. Optionally, sound is also recorded and stored in the WMF file.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
